chart.title: Gross domestic product (GDP)
chart.subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
chart.note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices, using multiple benchmark years to adjust for differences in the cost of living between countries over time.
chart.citation: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021)

GDP (output, multiple price benchmarks).citationShort: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table (2021) – with major processing by Our World in Data
